name: A windy journey
description:
A guy goes for a lonely walk over a windy hill, but things take a turn for the best.

Credits:
* Clerg0: implementation, design
* Saltadrow: art, design
* Titwin: implementation, design
* SolRoo: art, narration, implementation

* Narration : https://uberduck.ai/speak#voice=mr-narrator 
* FX: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/universal-sound-fx-17256
